title: Moroccan Oil Hair Treatment 3.4 Oz Bottle with Blue Box
description: Moroccanoil is an ultra-light formula which is absorbed by the hair instantly, resulting in a natural, silky finish and brilliant shine.  Moroccanoil has the ability to restore over-processed hair damaged by environmental factors and chemical procedures - it also revives, hydrates and detangles hair, wigs and hair extensions.
